name: LiveHint
0:
”Alexa, open Live Hint”
”Alexa, start Live Hint”
”Alexa, launch Live Hint”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: live hint
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use LiveHint to get hints to Assignment problems from your Carnegie Learning MATHbook. Make sure you try to solve the problem by yourself first. Then, locate the Assignment you're working on by saying the Course, Module, Page, and Question Number. Then follow the prompts to hear the directions and the hints to help you solve the problem. Ask for another hint or repeat at any time.

To get more out of LiveHint: (1) Take your time to listen to and think about the directions and hints. (2) Ask someone to listen to the hints with you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
